SEARCH
Package model.area

Interface Occupable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionSpace, CouncilPalace, MultipleActionSpace, SingleActionSpace
public interface Occupable
The Interface Occupable exposes some methods to every object of the game that can be occupied by a Family Member

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • isOccupied

      boolean isOccupied()

    • isOccupable

      boolean isOccupable(FamilyMember familyMember)
      Checks if is occupable.
      Parameters:
      familyMember - the family member
      Returns:
      true if it's occupable by the familyMember passed. N.B (we're not considering here the fact that more family members of the same players can't stay in the same tower, it can't be done at this level)

      ArrayList<FamilyMember> occupiedByMember()
